channel.title: [508] Fletching Help [508]
channel.description:
Ok, so ive got everything to work in my code for the regular bow, deletes both items, adds bow, animation, sends message. All i need is for it to add skill xp, which i did try to use this line
[code=java]p.addSkillXp[14] = 5;[/code]
Which 14 is mining as i later learned but i just wanted it to add xp. It gave me an error.
Anything im doing wrong?
Thanks, Wookiezz

item.title: [508] Fletching Help [508]
item.dc:creator: @wookiezz wookiezz
item.description:
@wookiezz wrote:

Ok, so ive got everything to work in my code for the regular bow, deletes both items, adds bow, animation, sends message. All i need is for it to add skill xp, which i did try to use this line

p.addSkillXp[14] = 5;

Which 14 is mining as i later learned but i just wanted it to add xp. It gave me an error.
